quote_first: I woke up and glanced at my watch on the table next to my bed. It was
quote_last: . My heart was beating furiously. I slid off the bed down onto the carpet, sat cross-legged, and took some deep breaths. Then I held my breath, relaxed my shoulders, sat up straight, and tried to focus. I must have swum too much, I decided, or got too much sun.
title: Blind Willow, Sleeping Woman
author: Haruki Murakami
